allow: Bash(cmd /c "echo [清理] 删除不需要的文件... && \(if exist .github\\workflows rmdir /s /q .github\\workflows\) && \(if exist .github\\ISSUE_TEMPLATE rmdir /s /q .github\\ISSUE_TEMPLATE\) && \(if exist .github\\pictures rmdir /s /q .github\\pictures\) && \(if exist .github\\FUNDING.yml del /q .github\\FUNDING.yml\) && \(if exist QUICKSTART.md del /q QUICKSTART.md\) && \(if exist GITHUB_SETUP.md del /q GITHUB_SETUP.md\) && \(if exist UPLOAD_GUIDE.md del /q UPLOAD_GUIDE.md\) && \(if exist UPLOAD_STEPS.md del /q UPLOAD_STEPS.md\) && \(if exist README_GITHUB.md del /q README_GITHUB.md\) && echo [完成] 清理完成")
